name: Crusader Kings II: The Old Gods
name_original: Crusader Kings II: The Old Gods
description:
Crusader Kings II: The Old Gods is a strategy game developed by Paradox Development Studio. It came out on 28-05-2013. It was published by Paradox Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Crusader Kings II: The Old Gods is available on PC.
